text: Jean-François Cesarini (30 September 1970 - 29 March 2020) was a French politician. He was a member of the La République En Marche! (LREM). He was elected to the French National Assembly on 18 June 2017, representing the department of Vaucluse. Cesarini was born in Avignon, France. Cesarini died on 29 March 2020 of cancer in Paris at the age of 49. ==References== Category:1970 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Cancer deaths in France Category:Politicians from Provence-Alpes-Cote d'Azur Category:People from Avignon
title: Jean-François Cesarini
